SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PURPOSE OF THE ENDOWMENT IS TO PROVIDE RELIABLE AND GROWING SUPPORT FOR THE ONGOING OPERATIONS OF THE SCHOOL. THE PURPOSE OF THE INVESTMENT COMMITTEE IS TO INVEST THE ENDOWMENT TO PRODUCE TWO RESULTS: 1. PROVIDE A RELIABLE AND GROWING STREAM OF SPENDABLE FUNDS. 2. PROTECT AGAINST PERMANENT CAPITAL LOSS, WHILE PRESERVING AND GROWING THE REAL VALUE OF THE CORPUS OVER TIME.

POLICY IS DESCRIBED IN SCHOOL REGISTRATION MATERIALS

THE HEAD OF SCHOOL IS REQUIRED TO LIVE ON CAMPUS AS A CONDITION OF EMPLOYMENT. THE HOUSE WHERE THE HEAD OF SCHOOL RESIDES IS USED FOR MULTIPLE SCHOOL EVENTS.
